'''Lumenstone''' is a [[Quest Item]] obtained during the {{Quest|Surreptitious Seven-Star Seal Sundering}}.

During the subsequent quest ''[[Chasm Spelunkers]]'', it transforms into [[Lumenstone Adjuvant]].
